Before running, READ ME!
info:
This flow configures the camera
1. MQTT
2. Events
3. AOA

Before running you must set the camera address and credentials.
1. Double-click the Orange Node "Device Info"
2. Click the pen-icon to the right of "Camera"
3. Set camera address, user and password.
4. Click Save
